body.name: HandFan 10400mAh Portable Handheld Fan, Battery Operated Rechargeable Fan, Foldable Mini Personal Fan, Cooling Hand Fans for Travel, Outdoors, Indoors(Transparent Blade)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 50 mins
features: [40H Long-lasted] Come with double 5200mAh large capacity rechargeable batteries, total capacity is 10400mAh, which can last 10-40Hrs after fully charged, so you won't worry about power off and keep cool all day outdoors.

[Two Backup Portable Chargers] Portable Charger handle design, so it's not just a cooling fan, but a useful and convenient power, you don't need to carry extra bulky power and charge your phone outdoors.

[6 Fan Blades]: Adopt 6 fan blades design, equipped with brushless motor, the motor speed is up to 3600rpm at 3rd speed, so this handheld fan can generate strong airflow, cool you down in few seconds on hot days.

[Foldable&Easy to Carry]: Foldable design, this small portable fan can be adjusted from 0°to 180°, so it can be used as a desk fan and put into the bag more easily. perfect for outdoor activities and travel.
[Long Durability]: Using energy-saving DC Brushless motor, which can work continuously for about 20000 hours, about 7-10 years life for general usage, so you can use it for a long time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Save charging time, Always stay cool 10400mAh Portable Handheld Personal Fan HandFan was established in 2007 and is mainly engaged in the production, research, and sales of patented rechargeable fans and humidifiers. Our company has over 10 years of product development experience and a strong engineering research and development team. HandFan series fans have a wide range of models and have become popular in Japan, South Korea, Europe, the United States, Southeast Asia, Taiwan, etc. They are deeply loved by many customers and become one of the most popular consumer electronics products. Our customers are all over the world.

A cooling fan can be the ideal solution for the hottest days of the year. But most of them won't be long-lasted. This fan has two batteries, one for cooling, the other is for backup. when one battery needs charging, you can replace it quickly and keep cool all day. It's the best travel fan to keep you cool on your vacation or while you’re traveling.

Compact Size Portable and foldable design makes it pretty convenient to put in the bag and keeps you cool anywhere anytime. The best choice for you on hot days. Package List 1 x Mini Fan 2 x Power Bank 1 x USB Cable 1 x Metal Clip 1 x User Manual
Specifications Model HF310 Input 5V/2A Power 4W Battery 10400mAh(Two Battery Pack) Wind Speed 3 Settings Running Hours 10-40H

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THIS IS THE BEST HANDHELD FAN EVER!
reviews.reviewText: This fan is awesome! I visit WDW about 7 times a year and I take this with me to the parks every single time. I swear it has saved my life in the FL sweltering heat. I don't know how people can get by without it. The battery lasted the whole day and I ran this sucker on high most of the time, even when I went inside. It will cool you off a lot faster using it in the A/C when you've been sweating and are overheated. It folds so you can position it on a table in front of you which is especially nice when you are hot and you sit down to eat. It folds up all the way so it's easy to carry in a small bag and the back up battery is great to have if you forget to charge the battery overnight for the next day. I simply cannot be without this fan in the parks. It costs a little more than some of the others, but it is so worth it. I used this fan for 3 years and 4 months before I purchased another simply because over time the battery will lose its ability to hold a charge for long periods like with anything else that is rechargeable. That is to be expected. The original fan still works just fine and I use that one on the bathroom counter when I'm blow drying my hair so I don't sweat my makeup off!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More than a fan - it's your backup battery charger too!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a bunch of small portable fans to figure out which one was the best. This fan was absolutely the winner! Yes it was the most expensive, but it is by far the best value. I have used this fan in our trailer, at home, in my vehicle, and even carry it in my backpack. I love that it has 2 batteries, so I always have a reliable phone charger and/or spare fan battery. The fan itself will run for the entire night on just 1 battery charge. I don't know how long it will run after a night, but was happy it never slowed down overnight. I find that the lowest speed is just right for sleeping or reading, and the higher speeds will cool you off quickly if needed. There are tinier fans, but they aren't as just perfect as this fan. I also like how it folds as a stand, and I use the little metal piece to hang it tilted on the wall and aimed at my face when we're camping in our trailer. This summer I was in extremely hot weather and having this fan gave me peace of mind knowing that I could survive if my vehicle had engine trouble. It is a great emergency fan! I got my family the black ones and I got a pink one so no one would take mine, ha!I feel this fan is durable, has a good cage around the blades so they don't get bent, good quality, and a worthwhile value. I am cheap when it comes to spending money so an item has to offer value for the price, and this fan does that. It surprised me how much I preferred this fan over the other ones I had bought to try out. I only got this one to try because of other reviews here, and they were surprisingly right. Give it a try, return it if you don't like it. That extra battery is handy though....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You want this one!
reviews.reviewText: Holy cow this is perfect. This puts out hella cool air. So much more powerful than any other handheld fan I’ve ever used. I love that I don’t need to keep replacing batteries! Just plug it into a USB and charge it back up. The fact that it comes with 2 battery packs (and they’re already charged when this arrived!) is genius. It means you’re never without one. 3 speeds so you are in control. And I love that the head bends so you can prop it up on a table and not have to hold it if you don’t want to. This fan is perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Powerful fan with three speeds. Unless you're using it as a desk fan the second battery is overkill, as a charge lasts a long time. Fan is quiet and sits nicely on a flat surface. This is a good fan for anyone who needs a lot of cooling power in a small package.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful, quiet, perfect
reviews.reviewText: Love the lightweight, power and additional battery if this. The handle bends so that you can place it on a table and direct it towards you. I brought it with me while traveling on airplanes and trains that get hot this summer and I was so happy I had it. Used it for a week and never had to charge or change battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars HOT, HOT, HOT!
reviews.reviewText: I like the fan because I work outside & it helps to cool me down so I don't get heat exhaustion. Also because it comes with 2 batteries that are rechargeable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good air movement for the size, plus a spare battery!
reviews.reviewText: Pleasantly surprised. Seems well-made for the price point, has three speeds, and an extra battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This fan is a lifesaver!
reviews.reviewText: It’s powerful! It’s small and fits in your purse. The dual batteries are fantastic. You can use one for your fan and charge your phone with the other one. The batteries run the fan for hours! This is my second one. The other still works but the hinge that holds fan to the base is broken. Works so good that I just taped it together. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
I love the fan, the wind keep you chill
